name: Sass
description: Automatically compile scss files on save.

config.title: CSS Style
config.description: Controls the output style of the resulting CSS.

config.title: Error CSS
config.description: Tells Sass whether to emit a CSS file when an error occurs during compilation.

config.title: Generate Source Map
config.description: Source maps are files that tell browsers or other tools that consume CSS how that CSS corresponds to the Sass files from which it was generated. They make it possible to see and even edit your Sass files in browsers.

config.title: Update Path
config.description: Manually set path that an update will be performed on, relative to the workspace directory

config.title: Output Path
config.description: Manually set the output path of the generated css files, relative to the workspace directory

config.title: Executable Path
config.description: Manually set the path for the sass executable.
